Girobusan | IMP!

IMP! Netart theme

With optional subheading

The light theme for long articles with big illustrations.

To install this theme:

  1. Download css (right click on link, choose "save as")
  2. Save it where your IMP! page is.
  3. Open IMP! page for editing.
  4. Navigate to the bottom of the editor
  5. Fill the CSS name in View CSS location field
  6. Save page

Second level

Theme is ready for syntax highlighting (IMP! version > 0.2.5)

//strange function
function makeStrange(n){
    console.log("one moment, please");
    return strange(n);
}
